explains: v. 简化，精简（simplify 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.en: The application forms have now been simplified.
I've heard from and talked to many people who described how Mother Nature simplified their lives for them.
sentences.cn: 我曾听闻过、也曾和很多人交谈过，他们描述了大自然是如何简化他们的生活的。

sentences.en: I am not sure who got me to the wonders of Tick Tock Timer, but it has simplified and saved my life in countless ways.
sentences.cn: 我不知道是谁将我带到滴滴答答定时器的奇观世界中，但它在无尽的方面简化及合理化我的生活了。
